rows.label: tev061201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev061201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Warawa about New LA.

rows.label: tev061201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev061201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Warawa if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev061201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Warawa about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev061201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Warawa about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Warawa used to just wither away in forgotten cave 
because dadapon say it safer there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Compared to that place, human city of friend is so big
and beautiful and peaceful! Warawa never feel so free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Warawa has to make up for so many days being kept
cooped up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0004
rows.name:
So Warawa is making sure to enjoy every day here
twice as much. Hurray for friendship treaty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Before, Warawa could have all Warawa wanted,
because money made world go round.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0009
rows.name:
But in city of friend, Warawa has finally found
something that money cannot buy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0010
rows.name:
And that something is complete Miralife Card collection!
Warawa never knew of trading card concept until
human friends came along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0011
rows.name: Come back later if friend wants to know more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0012
rows.name:
By then, Warawa will finally have gold card to rub in
face of friend! Oh-ho-ho-hooooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0013
rows.name: Warawa often passes time by thinking up stories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0020
rows.name:
So Warawa tried offering Ma-non huge sum of money
to build machine that can make stories come true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0021
rows.name:
But Ma-non laughed Warawa right out of room.
Can friend believe it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0022
rows.name:
Mmmrrr... Ma-non had some nerve turning nose up
at such brilliant idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0023
rows.name: Clearly Ma-non have no vision OR tact. Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0028
rows.name:
One hobby of Warawa is spending time with prince
who live inside dreams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0029
rows.name:
But if Warawa while away too many hours sleeping,
Warawa will stop eating and bathingâ€”and eventually
whole pampered existence will come tumbling down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Thankfully, Warawa manage to convince Ma-non to
create machine that allows sleeping and bathing
AT SAME TIME![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0031
rows.name:
Now Warawa can take bath with dream prince!
So scandalous! ...But heavenly. ...But scandalous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Warawa about recent developments.

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0014
rows.name:
Look! Just LOOK how shiny gold nopopotamus card of
Warawa is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0015
rows.name:
Many thanks, friend! Warawa will care for this so
long as body draws breath.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Warawa will sleep with it, and bathe with it,
and give it attention from morning to night, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0017
rows.name:
...Hmm? That will get card dirty? Nonsense!
Warawa has flexed considerable financial muscle to
order sturdy custom sleeve for card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0018
rows.name: Not even millesaur or EM Zenith Cannon can break it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Did friend try making recipe from mamapon of
Warawa?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0041
rows.name: ...Meh? Not yet? Meh! What is holdup?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061201_MSG0042
rows.name:
Warawa cannot stand people who give up halfway.
Friend must finish what friend has begun![ST:wait ]
